prompt.title: Knowledge
prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content:
I apologize, but there is no actual document or content provided after the "The document" heading. The message ends with "Take information from this document:" followed by ">!!!!!!" which does not contain any meaningful information to extract or analyze. 

To extract important knowledge, I would need the actual text or content of the document. Without that, I cannot perform the requested task of extracting and organizing information according to the given rules.
